entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Saint-Quentin
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 12 except minus 17 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 12 except minus 17 in low lying areas. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 13 February 2023
